description: Franky is the shipwright for the http://anidb.net/ch1954 [Straw Hat Pirates]. He is a 34 year old cyborg from Water 7, and was introduced in the story as the leader of the http://anidb.net/ch3252 [Franky Family], a group of ship dismantlers. He is also so far one of the two "true" cyborgs so far shown in the series, with the other being the http://anidb.net/ch2135 [Shichibukai], http://anidb.net/ch3841 [Bartholomew Kuma], and was the first one to be introduced. He was originally named Cutty Flam until he threw away his original name for his nickname per the request by http://anidb.net/ch3264 [Iceburg] to hide his identity. Franky and followers were originally introduced as antagonists of the Water 7 Arc against the Straw Hats until circumstances forced them to become allies. Per the request of the Franky Family, Franky was allowed to join the Straw Hats to fulfill his dream. He is the eighth member of the Straw Hat crew and the seventh to join http://anidb.net/ch474 [Luffy]`s crew. He is also the second member to have been a former villain (the first being http://anidb.net/ch488 [Nico Robin]).
name: Franky
